title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and in exercise of the powers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Transport (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited transport (delegation ministerial functions) order 2021

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and in exercise of the powers
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Transport, conferred on him by or under – 

(a) 

(b) 

section 44D (4)(b)(ii), and 

section 44J (7)(b)(ii), 

of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) are delegated to 
Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

2 December, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th December, 2021.
